00033  * Image structure. You don't care what this is.
00034  */

00039  * Magic numbers for normal and byte-swapped Cineon and Dpx files
00040  */
00041 
00042 #define CINEON_FILE_MAGIC 0x802A5FD7
00043 #define DPX_FILE_MAGIC 0x53445058

00046  * Image 8 bit <-> 10 bit conversion parameters.
00047  */
00048 
00049 typedef struct {
00050     float gamma;
00051     int blackPoint;
00052     int whitePoint;
00053     int doLogarithm;
00054 } LogImageByteConversionParameters;

00066 /* see Kodak docs for details... */
